description: This file contains multiple provider classes for state management in a Flutter app, including WorkoutsProvider, DietProvider, ClientsProvider, and ProtocolsProvider. Each class manages loading, creating, updating, and deleting entities through corresponding repositories, and notifies listeners of changes.

classes.name: WorkoutsProvider
classes.description: State management for workout plans, providing methods to load, create, update, and delete workouts.

classes.name: DietProvider
classes.description: Manages the state related to diet plans with methods for CRUD operations.

classes.name: ClientsProvider
classes.description: Handles client data, allowing loading, creation, updating, and deletion of clients.

classes.name: ProtocolsProvider
classes.description: Manages protocol goals, supporting load, create, update, and delete functionalities.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a page of entities from the associated repository, updating the internal list and notifying listeners.

methods.name: submitCreate
methods.description: Creates a new entity via the repository and refreshes the list to page 1.

methods.name: submitUpdate
methods.description: Updates an entity by ID and reloads the current page.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes an entity by ID and reloads the current page.
